entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 12:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure: 97.9 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
